title: ‘Mother Russia’ Review: A New Play That’s as Funny as It’s Smart
summary_full: A strong cast stars in Lauren Yee’s new play, part of a cycle of works about the collisions between 20th-century communism and pop culture.
summary_public: A strong cast stars in Lauren Yee’s new play, part of a cycle of works about the collisions between 20th-century communism and pop culture.
